## Description of simulation

The simulation takes place on a two-dimensional $n \times n$ square grid, with $n = 30$ being the initial default setting.
The grid is filled with three colors of squares: [**blue**]{.tableau-blue-text}, [**orange**]{.tableau-orange-text}, and **white** squares.
